individual_metadata.synopsis: Intelligence officer reacts to your presence, both before and after the Templar dialogue
individual_metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to Intelligence officer 03 in the Security Office.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The input contains only one session (with an empty name). While the synopsis mentions that the intelligence officer reacts both before and after the Templar dialogue, there is no separate Templar dialogue session provided to establish an ordering constraint relative to this session. Without additional sessions, no specific ordering or exclusiveness rules can be derived.

0.speaker: Ardent Qu'th
0.text: That Queen Vlaakith trusted you with such a task... You must not fail..

1.speaker: Ardent Qu'th
1.text: You bore the weapon this far. If it must be purged by your hand, so be it.
1.context: NodeContext: Determined, ready to serve in your place

2.speaker: Ardent Qu'th
2.text: Our mission is urgent, and our time short. Do not waste it.

3.speaker: Ardent Qu'th
3.text: An invitation to speak with the ch'r'ai? You are honoured.
3.context: NodeContext: Almost a warning - don't mess it up
